name: U-Type C64.
description:
A Quick Shoot em up for the C64/TheC64Maxi/Mini, Or C64 Emulator.

UPDATED: V1.1 - Bug Fix and Music Changed.

Quick made Game to test out my background Scrolling effects, I was bored, Not tested on NTSC so i would say PAL Only.

  • Hard at the start until you get the good power up.
  • Shortish Game
  • Does have an end screen
  • New Background Scrolling Effects
  • 4 weapon power ups and extra life power up
  • Chose Music or Sound FX on the Title Screen
  • D64 has Load/Save of Hi-Scores

Made with some help from the Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Sideway Hacked Version by Jon Wells, Modified SEUCK framework Code by Me, Original Framework Code by Richard Bayliss of TND, Music by Dwayne Bakewell.
